channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15527] Refactor Compactor related classes
item.description: DefaultCompactor and MultiOutputCompactor still have a lot of duplicate code now, need refactoring.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

The checkstyle issues of branch-1 and 0.98 do not make sense...

And I haven't found any findbugs warning related to the 0.98 patch. For the javadoc issues, I have checked the diff of the output with or without patch, no more warnings, both are 100 warnings.

Will commit shortly if no objection.

Thanks.

Pushed to branch-1.3+ and 0.98.

Thanks stack and Enis Soztutar for reviewing.
